channel.title: Ice1187 on Ice1187's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ice1187 on Ice1187's Blog

item.title: [TryHackMe] Pickle Rick Writeup
item.description: 這是一個非常 basic 的題目，但一開始還是因為 wordlist 沒有對的字串，稍微卡了一下。: ( 學到的東西 PT 如果網頁沒東西，nmap 沒有特別的 port，gobuster 也沒有找到東西的時候，可以試試看換個 wordlists 搜網頁，像是： raft-<size>.txt raft-<size>-files.txt directory-list-2.3-<size>/txt 有 command execution 之後，一定要試試看 sudo、找 user 的 .ssh/ 能不能讀寫。 Information nmape # Nmap 7.60 scan initiated Tue Jun 1 15:41:12 2021 as: nmap -sC -sV -v -oA nmap.txt 10.10.110.99 Increasing send delay for 10.10.110.99 from 0 to 5 due to 41 out of 135 dropped probes since last increase. Nmap scan report for 10.

item.title: [HTB] Luanne Writeup
item.description: Recon nmap ice1187@ubuntu:~/htb/luanne$ nmap -sC -sV -o nmap/nmap.out 10.10.10.218 Starting Nmap 7.80 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2021-04-06 22:42 CST Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.218 Host is up (0.079s latency). Not shown: 997 closed ports PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 8.0 (NetBSD 20190418-hpn13v14-lpk; protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 3072 20:97:7f:6c:4a:6e:5d:20:cf:fd:a3:aa:a9:0d:37:db (RSA) | 521 35:c3:29:e1:87:70:6d:73:74:b2:a9:a2:04:a9:66:69 (ECDSA) |_ 256 b3:bd:31:6d:cc:22:6b:18:ed:27:66:b4:a7:2a:e4:a5 (ED25519) 80/tcp open http nginx 1.19.0 | http-auth: | HTTP/1.
